bio: Hailing from the sprawling plains of Whiterun, I, Axel Zenphire, embraced the shadows as a Dragon nightblade. Driven by an unyielding desire to eradicate the undead, my skills in stealth and magic became my weapons of choice. A relentless personal challenge loomed – a fear of fire. Through rigorous training with a fire mage, I not only overcame this fear but emerged from the flames stronger, a nightblade forged in the crucible of my own fears.
name: Axel Zenphire
